record.id: field.name="request.report" and file.name="cm3rcatphase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: request.report
record.file.name: cm3rcatphase

brief.brief: The Report to run when the operator selects the print option while viewing a Request.
If this field is empty (NULL), the print option is not available.
The default report is cm3u.print.request. This report works in conjunction with the Request Formats field.

detail.detail: The validation routine ensures that the Report name you specify is a valid Report name. If it is not, Service Manager displays the message: "The Report *report name* is not defined."
The validation routine terminates the Validation process and returns you to the Report View of the Phase definition.
